name: CombineReachability
description:
CombineReachability adds easy to use Combine publishers for [ReachabilitySwift](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/Reachability.swift).
It adds the ability to react to network reachability changes in a reactive way using the power of Combine.
This library was inspired by the RxSwift Community's [RxReachability](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/RxReachability) library.
